LockedExhibit.source_clue: Mrs. White told me that the key that opens the cases in which all the valuables were displayed was missing from its hook in the kitchen by the time she served breakfast.
LockedExhibit.template: The cases where the valuables were displayed were left locked, yet the key was missing.

SecuredStorage.source_clue: Mr. Boddy had his Jewelry locked up all day.
SecuredStorage.template: Mr. Boddy had his {item_category} locked up all day.

ItemUsedAsWeapon.source_clue: This morning I found Mr. Boddy's expensive spy glass in the secret passage; it had been damaged with a large dent in the metal on one end.
ItemUsedAsWeapon.template: This morning I found Mr. Boddy's {item} in the {location}, with a heavy dent as if it had been used to strike something.
